BrowserLanguage.Name: Browser Language
BrowserLanguage.Description: The language of the users browser. It will come from the accept-language header or the navigator.language if the former is null.

Country.Name: Country
Country.Description: The users country from their IP.

Date.Name: Date
Date.Description: The date. It accepts any valid date format, but the suggested format is YYYY-MM-DD.

DayOfWeek.Name: Day of Week
DayOfWeek.Description: The day of the week, Monday to Sunday. 1 is Monday, 7 is Sunday.

HostNameByAddress.Name: Host Name By Address
HostNameByAddress.Description: The users host name (DNS lookup of the users IP address).

QueryParameter.Name: Query Parameter
QueryParameter.Description: The query parameter after the ? in the URL.

Referer.Name: Referer
Referer.Description: The website that the user just came from.

ScannedQr.Name: Scanned QR
ScannedQr.Description: Whether the QR code was scanned or not. Novu.link appends a utm_medium parameter to the URL when the app-povided QR code is scanned.

Time.Name: Time
Time.Description: The time of day. This time is relative to UTC, meaning that its perfect for fixed times that are not subject to timezone changes.

TotalTimesScanned.Name: Total Times Scanned
TotalTimesScanned.Description: The total amount of times the QR code has been scanned or the link has been visited.

TotalTimesScannedPerIP.Name: Total Times Scanned Per IP
TotalTimesScannedPerIP.Description: The total amount of times the QR code has been scanned or the link has been visited, per unique IP.

DeviceOrientation.Name: Device Orientation
DeviceOrientation.Description: The users device orientation. Either landscape-primary, landscape-secondary (upside-down), portrait-primary, or portrait-secondary (upside-down).

SupportsGeolocation.Name: Supports Geolocation
SupportsGeolocation.Description: The users support of geolocation. This returns true if the users browser supports getting the users location.

UserTime.Name: User Time
UserTime.Description: The time of day relative to the users current timezone.

IsBot.Name: Is Bot
IsBot.Description: Whether the user is a bot or not.
